item.title: GWT and Spring Integration - java.net.InetAddress is a restricted class
item.description: When trying to integrate both Spring and GWT, one might encounter the following error in the Spring Eclipse IDE: “java.net.InetAddress is a restricted class”. The problem happens when you try to use Spring configuration for your database. In my case, I was using Spring to update data back to a H2 database. Well, here’s one way to deal with this issue. Disable the “Google App Engine”. Yes, based on my research, if you’re usingÂ GWT, you can disable Google App Engine and still continue your development with GWT.
